sourcing.instructions: Aluminum: Local metal supply store or online metal retailer.
steps: Aluminum: Local metal supply store or online metal retailer.
1. Measure 12.0 g of Aluminum and 48.0 g of Aluminum Oxide.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 12.0 g of Aluminum and 48.0 g of Aluminum Oxide.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture to a crucible suitable for high-temperature processing.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture to a crucible suitable for high-temperature processing.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally (approximately 4 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally (approximately 4 hours).

steps: 1. Use a diamond saw to cut the solid sample to the desired dimensions (3 x 2 x 7 inches).
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Use a diamond saw to cut the solid sample to the desired dimensions (3 x 2 x 7 inches).
